overview: Lawrence is responsible for the technical architecture and technology decisions at Mirror42. Lawrence Pit has always been working on the creation of mission critical enterprise management applications. Before joining Mirror42, Lawrence founded two software development companies: Moonshake Technologies, where he served as Chief Software Architect, and later Boston IT where he was the managing director. He worked for companies such as Hewlett-Packard OpenView and Cisco Systems having the role of Lead Software Architect. He also worked several years for PROLIN, a company specializing in IT Service Management software. Lawrence Pit received a Master of Science in Computer Science from the University of Leiden.
